filmography.title: Andy Hardy's Double Life
filmography.role_description: A college student who becomes the object of Andy Hardy's affection; Williams' screen debut.
filmography.plot: Before heading to college, Andy Hardy tries to settle his debts and handle romance, meeting the stunning Sheila Brooks.

filmography.title: A Guy Named Joe
filmography.role_description: A young transport pilot who becomes the romantic interest of the pilot guided by a guardian angel.
filmography.plot: A pilot kills himself in a crash and returns as a guardian angel to guide a young pilot through the war and in love.

filmography.title: Bathing Beauty
filmography.role_description: A college swimming instructor whose husband enrolls in her all-female school to win her back.
filmography.plot: A songwriter enrolls in a women's college to win back his estranged wife, a swimming teacher.

filmography.title: Thrill of a Romance
filmography.role_description: A swimming instructor who finds romance with a war hero at a resort while her new husband is away on business.
filmography.plot: A newlywed woman, abandoned by her husband for business, falls for a war hero at a mountain resort.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Follies
filmography.role_description: Featured in the 'A Water Ballet' segment, showcasing her swimming talents in a lavish production number.
filmography.plot: From heaven, Florenz Ziegfeld recalls his greatest stars and introduces a series of musical and comedy numbers.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Best Musical Comedy

filmography.title: The Hoodlum Saint
filmography.role_description: A singer who falls for a cynical newspaper man trying to manipulate charities.
filmography.plot: A cynical reporter tries to make money by starting a charity, but finds redemption through love and faith.

filmography.title: Easy to Wed
filmography.role_description: A wealthy heiress who becomes the target of a newspaper libel suit scheme involving a hired romancer.
filmography.plot: A newspaper hires a gigolo to compromise an heiress who is suing them for libel, but he falls in love with her.

filmography.title: Fiesta
filmography.role_description: The twin sister of a matador who steps into the bullring disguised as her brother to save his reputation.
filmography.plot: A retired matador wants his son to be a bullfighter, but the son prefers music, while his twin sister has the talent for the ring.

filmography.title: This Time for Keeps
filmography.role_description: An aquatic star who falls in love with a returning soldier who wants to be a singer, not enter his father's opera business.
filmography.plot: A soldier returns home from the war and tries to pursue a singing career against his father's wishes.

filmography.title: On an Island with You
filmography.role_description: A movie star filming in Hawaii who is kidnapped by a naval officer advisor who is in love with her.
filmography.plot: A movie star travels to Hawaii to film a movie, where a naval officer falls in love with her despite her engagement.

filmography.title: Take Me Out to the Ball Game
filmography.role_description: The strict, beautiful new owner of a baseball team who clashes with and romances her star players.
filmography.plot: Two baseball players who moonlight as vaudevillians run into trouble when their team is taken over by a woman.

filmography.title: Neptune's Daughter
filmography.role_description: A swimsuit designer who tries to protect her sister from a heartbreaker but finds romance herself.
filmography.plot: A swimsuit designer and her sister get mixed up with a polo team masseur and a South American playboy.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song ('Baby, It's Cold Outside')

filmography.title: Duchess of Idaho
filmography.role_description: A woman who travels to Sun Valley to help her friend's romance but ends up in a love triangle of her own.
filmography.plot: A secretary plays matchmaker for her boss but ends up falling for the man she is trying to set up with her friend.

filmography.title: Pagan Love Song
filmography.role_description: A half-American, half-Tahitian woman who enchants an American schoolteacher inheriting a plantation.
filmography.plot: A schoolteacher travels to Tahiti to take over a plantation, only to find it is not the paradise he expected.

filmography.title: Texas Carnival
filmography.role_description: A carnival worker who, along with her partner, is mistaken for a wealthy heiress at a Texas resort.
filmography.plot: A dunk-tank worker and his partner are mistaken for millionaires at a Texas resort hotel.

filmography.title: Skirts Ahoy!
filmography.role_description: One of three women who join the WAVES (Navy women's reserve) to find husbands and adventure.
filmography.plot: Three young women join the Navy and find romance and comical situations during their training.

filmography.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
filmography.role_description: The biopic of the Australian swimming champion who overcame polio to become a vaudeville star; Williams' signature role.
filmography.plot: The biography of Australian swimming champion and vaudeville star Annette Kellerman.

filmography.title: Dangerous When Wet
filmography.role_description: A fitness enthusiast who swims the English Channel, featuring a famous underwater sequence with Tom and Jerry.
filmography.plot: A farming family enters a channel-swimming contest to save their farm, with the daughter taking the lead.

filmography.title: Easy to Love
filmography.role_description: A swimming star at Cypress Gardens who tries to make her boss jealous by dating a crooner.
filmography.plot: A synchronized swimmer in Florida tries to get her boss to notice her romantically.

filmography.title: Jupiter's Darling
filmography.role_description: A Roman woman who swims her way into Hannibal's camp to save Rome, seducing the conqueror.
filmography.plot: Hannibal marches on Rome, but is distracted by a beautiful woman who tries to save the city by seducing him.

filmography.title: The Unguarded Moment
filmography.role_description: A high school music teacher who is stalked by a student, showcasing her ability in a serious dramatic thriller.
filmography.plot: A schoolteacher receives anonymous love notes from a student, leading to a dangerous obsession.

filmography.title: Raw Wind in Eden
filmography.role_description: A fashion model stranded on a Mediterranean island where she enters a love triangle with a mysterious resident.
filmography.plot: A plane crash lands a model and a playboy on a secluded island inhabited by a mysterious man.

filmography.title: The Big Show
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman who becomes involved with a circus family in this drama set under the big top.
filmography.plot: The tyrannical owner of a circus dominates his sons, leading to tragedy and conflict within the family.

filmography.title: The Magic Fountain
filmography.role_description: The lead role in a fantasy film directed by her husband Fernando Lamas, released later in the US.
filmography.plot: A fantasy adventure involving a magical fountain and a quest.

filmography.title: That's Entertainment!
filmography.role_description: One of the narrators looking back at the golden age of MGM musicals, featuring clips from her famous water ballets.
filmography.plot: A documentary celebrating the 50th anniversary of MGM, featuring clips from its most famous musical films.
